entry.title: LDAP Searcher
entry.summary: LDAP Searcher: function LDAP-Search { $user = #samaccountname 'benis' $OU = #OU "OU=computers,DC=contoso,DC=com" $Searcher = New-Object DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher $Searcher.SearchRoot = 'LDAP://$OU' $Searcher.Filter = "(&(objectClass=user)(objectCategory=person)(sAMAccountName=$user))" $res = $Searcher.FindAll() | Sort-Object path foreach ($usrTmp in $res) { ...
